text:
Barrie Colin Keeffe (31 October 1945 - 10 December 2019) was an English dramatist and screenwriter. He was best known for his screenplay for the 1980 movie "The Long Good Friday". In 2010, his screenplay for "Sus" was one of his last works.
Keeffe died on 10 December 2019 in London after a short-illness, aged 74.
